short.ar: اكسب النقاط من خلال عمل لقطات جيدة مع شخصيتك قبل نفاد أسهمك.
short.am: ፍላጻዎችህ ከመጠናቀቃቸዉ በፊት በባህርይዎ ጥሩ ዉጤት በማድረግ ነጥብ ያግኙ።
short.bg: Спечелете точки, като направите добри снимки с вашия характер, преди стрелките ви да свършат.
short.bn: আপনার তীরগুলি শেষ হওয়ার আগে আপনার অক্ষরের সাথে ভাল শট তৈরি করে পয়েন্ট অর্জন করুন।
short.ca: Guanyeu punts fent bons trets amb el vostre personatge abans que s'esgotin les fletxes.
short.cs: Získávejte body tím, že se svou postavou uděláte dobré záběry dříve, než vám dojdou šípy.
short.da: Optjen point ved at lave gode skud med din karakter, før dine pile løber tør.
short.de: Verdiene Punkte, indem du gute Schüsse mit deinem Charakter machst, bevor deine Pfeile ausgehen.
short.el: Κερδίστε πόντους κάνοντας καλές βολές με τον χαρακτήρα σας πριν εξαντληθούν τα βέλη σας.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Earn points by making good shots with your character before your arrows run out.
short.es: Gana puntos haciendo buenos disparos con tu personaje antes de que se agoten las flechas.
short.et: Teenige punkte, tehes oma tegelasega häid kaadreid, enne kui nooled otsa saavad.
short.fa: کسب امتیاز با ساخت عکس خوب با شخصیت خود را قبل از فلش خود را اجرا کردن.
short.fi: Ansaitse pisteitä tekemällä hyviä kuvia hahmollasi, ennen kuin nuolesi loppuvat.
short.fil: Kumita ng mga puntos sa pamamagitan ng paggawa ng magandang shot sa iyong character bago ang iyong mga arrow maubusan.
short.fr: Gagnez des points en faisant de bons tirs avec votre personnage avant que vos flèches ne s’épuisent.
short.gu: તમારા તીર સમાપ્ત થાય તે પહેલાં તમારા પાત્ર સાથે સારા શોટ બનાવીને પોઇન્ટ્સ કમાઓ.
short.he: הרוויח נקודות על ידי ביצוע צילומים טובים עם הדמות שלך לפני שהחצים שלך נגמרים.
short.hi: अपने तीर बाहर चलाने से पहले अपने चरित्र के साथ अच्छे शॉट्स बनाकर अंक अर्जित करें।
short.hr: Zaradite bodove dobrim udarcima sa svojim likom prije nego što vam ponestane strelica.
short.hu: Szerezz pontokat azzal, hogy jó felvételeket készítesz a karaktereddel, mielőtt a nyilaid elfogynának.
short.id: Dapatkan poin dengan membuat tembakan yang bagus dengan karakter Anda sebelum panah Anda habis.
short.it: Guadagna punti facendo buoni colpi con il tuo personaggio prima che le tue frecce si esauriscano.
short.ja: あなたの矢印がなくなる前にあなたのキャラクターで良いショットを撮ることによってポイントを獲得してください。
short.kn: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬಾಣಗಳು ಖಾಲಿಯಾಗುವ ಮೊದಲು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಪಾತ್ರದೊಂದಿಗೆ ಉತ್ತಮ ಹೊಡೆತಗಳನ್ನು ಮಾಡುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಪಾಯಿಂಟ್ ಗಳನ್ನು ಸಂಪಾದಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 화살이 다 떨어지기 전에 캐릭터와 함께 좋은 샷을 만들어 포인트를 획득하세요.
short.lv: Nopelniet punktus, veicot labus kadrus ar savu varoni, pirms jūsu bultiņas beidzas.
short.ml: നിങ്ങളുടെ അമ്പുകൾ തീരുന്നതിനുമുമ്പ് നിങ്ങളുടെ കഥാപാത്രം ഉപയോഗിച്ച് നല്ല ഷോട്ടുകൾ നടത്തി പോയിന്റുകൾ നേടുക.
short.mr: आपले बाण संपण्यापूर्वी आपल्या चारित्र्यासह चांगले शॉट्स बनवून गुण मिळवा.
short.ms: Dapatkan mata dengan membuat pukulan yang baik dengan watak anda sebelum anak panah anda kehabisan.
short.nl: Verdien punten door goede foto's te maken met je personage voordat je pijlen opraken.
short.no: Tjen poeng ved å gjøre gode skudd med karakteren din før pilene dine går tom.
short.pl: Zdobywaj punkty, wykonując dobre strzały ze swoją postacią, zanim skończą się strzały.
short.ro: Câștiga puncte de a face fotografii bune cu personajul tău înainte de săgețile dumneavoastră a alerga afară.
short.ru: Зарабатывайте очки, делая хорошие выстрелы вместе со своим персонажем до того, как ваши стрелы закончатся.
short.sk: Získavajte body dobrými zábermi so svojou postavou skôr, ako vám dôjdu šípy.
short.sl: Zaslužite točke, tako da dobre posnetke s svojim značajem, preden puščice zmanjka.
short.sv: Tjäna poäng genom att göra bra bilder med din karaktär innan dina pilar tar slut.
short.sw: Pata pointi kwa kufanya risasi nzuri na tabia yako kabla ya mishale yako kuisha.
short.ta: உங்கள் அம்புகள் ரன் அவுட் முன் உங்கள் பாத்திரம் நல்ல ஷாட்கள் செய்வதன் மூலம் புள்ளிகள் சம்பாதிக்க.
short.te: మీ బాణాలు అయిపోవడానికి ముందు మీ క్యారెక్టర్ తో మంచి షాట్ లు చేయడం ద్వారా పాయింట్లను సంపాదించండి.
short.th: รับคะแนนด้วยการยิงที่ดีกับตัวละครของคุณก่อนที่ลูกศรของคุณจะหมด
short.tr: Oklarınız bitmeden önce karakterinizle iyi atışlar yaparak puan kazanın.
short.uk: Заробляйте очки, роблячи хороші знімки зі своїм персонажем до того, як ваші стрілки закінчаться.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Games prepared for children and adults sometimes attract attention with their exciting actions and sometimes with their calm and strategy-requiring structures. Tiny Archer offers players a unique experience by combining archery's noble, relaxed atmosphere with an action-packed design.

With its stylized graphics, Small Archer gives players the feeling of watching a work of art. However, under these graphics lies an action game experience full of high tempo and adrenaline. Our cute archer character progresses to new tracks as he hits the target boards. However, this journey takes work. Each new target board offers a more challenging experience than the previous one. The game puts the players in a shooting atmosphere and challenges their reflexes.

This game among archer games, which seems simple at first, becomes more challenging in the following levels. With few misses, players must think strategically and act quickly to make perfect shots. This makes the game more than just an archery simulator, turning it into a real action experience.

Tiny Archer combines the nobility of archery with action-packed gameplay. This game draws attention with its visual and auditory elements and appeals to archery enthusiasts and those who enjoy action games. Grab your arrow, set your target, and compete for the highest score.

How To Play
Played with Mouse.

Small Archer Shooting Game Features
✓ Infinity Level
✓ 2D Graphics
✓ Little Particle
✓ 2D Character
✓ Basic Control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Small Archer Shooting Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
